entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
